Html: Hello, first of all great idea for a tool to cover this gap however after placing within my environment, the tool is unable to see the store. LAcking that capability I am unable to set the store and thus export the term set. There is no error until I try to export the termset which obviously cant be exported because there is no 'Set' store. Is there any reason you can think of that I am unable to see the stores?
Figured it out after visiting Admin....I did not have full permissions. After testing with his account, it worked.
great, glad this tool helped you! Thank you for using it.
